casebody.data:
Huff
v.
Paramore 343P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 John M. Huff, Jr., for Huff, John M. (Jr.)

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of September 2016 by Petitioner for Hearing:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
